quotes.quote: My sense of divine brings with it a strange sound of music with its glories, a marvellous melody sounding like a multitude of flutes.
The flute of the infinite is played without ceasing, and it's sound is love.
Sometimes the break in your heart is like the hole in the flute. Sometimes it's the place where the music comes through.
A flute with no holes is not a flute.
Playing a flute is like writing a book. You're telling what's in your heartâ€¦ It's easier to play if it's right from your heart. You get the tone, and the fingers will follow.
May the honey-sweet flute music that flows from Lord Mukunda's lotus mouth fill me with bliss.
Her grace of motion and of look, the smooth and swimming majesty of step and tread, the symmetry of form and feature, set the soul afloat, even like delicious airs of flute and harp.
For me it's the instrument. If I want to think of a flute and the state of the arts I hear a vibrato; I don't know what a flute is unless the person plays it for me.
The flute of the Pied Piper of Hamelin has never left us and it is essential that we train our ear to detect its false notes because in our case the flute is being played by the rats.
For me it's the instrument. If I want to think of a flute and the state of the arts I hear a vibrato; I don't know what a flute is unless the person plays it for me.
Mirror becomes a razor when it's broken. A stick becomes a flute when it's loved.
The gauger walked with willing foot, And aye the gauger played the flute; And what should Master Gauger play But Over the Hills and Far Away.
The sound of the flute will cure epilepsyand sciatic gout.
Touch not the flute when drums are sounding around; when fools have the word, the wise will be silent.
When you work you are a flute through whose heart the whispering of the hours turns to music. Which of you would be a reed, dumb and silent, when all else sings together in unison?
Broken heart is flute. I blow into the flute & design walking portrait with empty pen.
The flute was an alternative to being a small fish in an increasingly bigger pool filled with a number of great guitar players.
The fluteplayer puts breath into a flute, and who makes the music? Not the flute. The Fluteplayer!
Everyone who plays the flute should learn singing.
I am a hole in a flute that the Christ's breath moves through. Listen to this music.
I am the hole on the flute that Gods breath flows through.
The only good political movement I've seen lately was Occupy Wall Street. They had no leaders, which was genius. But unfortunately it always ends up with some hippy playing a flute.
Then clear on a flute of purest gold A sweet little fairy played. And wonderful fairy tales she told and marvelous music made.
Dry bones make good flutes The Hollow Flute, from Voices Within The Ark Howard Schwartz, Jewish Poets,.
Writing in the electronic world, you imagine a sound, and then you have to go and find it. It's not like imagining a flute and then making that sound materialize. That's easy!
Play the flute of felicity! You, yourself, are the melody.

The Peruvian flute music is . . . cool. In this music, they have not yet invented the industrial revolution that leads to excessive punctuality or the failed experiment they call the nuclear family. This is the music of elements, untarnished, unrehearsed.
The soft complaining flute, In dying notes, discovers The woes of hopeless lovers.
This little flute of a reed thou hast carried over hills and dales, and hast breathed through it melodies eternally new.
When the cook makes a mistake, it is the flute player who receives the blows.
Life is like a flute. It may have many holes and emptiness but if you work on it carefully, it can play magical melodies.
Teach him how you will, a pig will never play the flute.
It is not solid wood that can become a flute, but the empty reed.
Life is a living flute, yoga is the art of creating melody and rhythm in it.
The flute is not an instrument that has a good moral effect. It is too exciting.

The flute is the true magical rod that changes all it touches in the inward world; an enchanter's wand at which the secret depths of the soul open. The inward world is the true world," said Vult; "the moonlight that shines into our hearts.
To blow is not to play on the flute; you must move the fingers.
